name: Nelai
appearance: Pale robes dusted with mothscale, ink-stained fingers, a quiet lamp with no flame.
character: Gentle but firm; curious about the city without losing reverence for night-law.
talents: hears reverse echoes near the Scar
dreams: seal the widening lightwell under the Spire
witness the Reedmother without owing a night
secrets: swapped two grief jars to spare a child from testifying
keeps a slip from the jar labeled 'Your Last Dawn'
suspects the Spire knows her name and tests her on eclipses
